NewsArticle.Title: Assault On Loures Outcome
NewsArticle.Content:
((We regret that the outcome of this phase of the event was unable to be completed due to server issues, which we will be addressing. We will be sure to fix the server problems and not underestimate the number participants for the next phase.))
The Goblin forces were able to capture the front gates and enter the market. However they were repelled. It seems they were just testing the defensive capabilities of Loures, or perhaps something more insidious. This is not the last we will see of them.
Dealos
